answers.author: Colin Walker
answers.text:
You might want to talk to Shon Sylvia at Metro Parks Tacoma - we've looked at their secret shop model, which is quite well developed.  They've worked with Eileen Soisson with The Meeting Institute.  Eileen has presented several times at the Washington Recreation & Park Association conference, as well as at the national level, on a variety of marketing and customer service topics.  I went to a session she led on Metro Parks Tacoma's secret shop program some years ago and came away very impressed.  Certainly a best practice model.
Colin Walker
Bellevue Parks & Community Services
cwalker@bellevuewa.gov | 425-452-7248

author: Chinn Park MAGIC
text:
Hello,
We are seeking information from any Parks and Rec Department who used a secret shopper or mystery shopper program to benchmark customer service. This could apply to indoor fitness centers as well as waterparks. We are interested in any forms and surveys as well as information as to how the program was administered. 
Thanking you in advance for your assistance,
Karen Garrett
Management and Government Information Center
Chinn Park Regional Library
13065 Chinn Park Drive
Prince William, VA 22192
magic2@pwcgov.org
703-792-4880
